verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> I waited <WH6960> patiently <WH6960> for the LORD; <WH3068> and he inclined <WH5186> to me, and heard <WH8085> my cry. <WH7775>

He brought <WH5927> me up also out of an horrible <WH7588> pit, <WH953> out of the miry <WH3121> clay, <WH2916> and set <WH6965> my feet <WH7272> on a rock, <WH5553> and established <WH3559> my goings. <WH838>

And he has put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892> in my mouth, <WH6310> even praise <WH8416> to our God: <WH430> many <WH7227> shall see <WH7200> it, and fear, <WH3372> and shall trust <WH982> in the LORD. <WH3068>

Blessed <WH835> is that man <WH1397> that makes <WH7760> the LORD <WH3068> his trust, <WH4009> and respects <WH6437> not the proud, <WH7295> nor <WH3808> such as turn <WH7750> aside <WH7847> to lies. <WH3576>

Many, <WH7227> O LORD <WH3068> my God, <WH430> are your wonderful <WH6381> works which you have done, <WH6213> and your thoughts <WH4284> which are to us-ward: <WH413> they cannot <WH408> be reckoned up in order <WH6186> to you: if I would declare <WH5046> and speak <WH1696> of them, they are more <WH6105> than can be numbered. <WH5608>
Sacrifice <WH2077> and offering <WH4503> you did not desire; <WH2654> my ears <WH241> have you opened: <WH3738> burnt <WH5930> offering and sin <WH2401> offering have you not required. <WH7592>
Then <WH227> said <WH559> I, See, <WH2009> I come: <WH935> in the volume <WH4039> of the book <WH5612> it is written <WH3789> of me,
I delight <WH2654> to do <WH6213> your will, <WH7522> O my God: <WH430> yes, your law <WH8451> is within <WH8432> my heart. <WH4578>
I have preached <WH1319> righteousness <WH6664> in the great <WH7227> congregation: <WH6951> see, <WH2009> I have not refrained <WH3607> my lips, <WH8193> O LORD, <WH3068> you know. <WH3045>

I have not hid <WH3680> your righteousness <WH6666> within <WH8432> my heart; <WH3820> I have declared <WH559> your faithfulness <WH530> and your salvation: <WH8668> I have not concealed <WH3582> your loving kindness <WH2617> and your truth <WH571> from the great <WH7227> congregation. <WH6951>
Withhold <WH3607> not you your tender mercies <WH7356> from me, O LORD: <WH3068> let your loving kindness <WH2617> and your truth <WH571> continually <WH8548> preserve <WH5341> me.

For innumerable <WH369> <WH4557> evils <WH7451> have compassed <WH661> me about: my iniquities <WH5771> have taken <WH5381> hold <WH5381> on me, so that I am not able <WH3201> to look <WH7200> up; they are more <WH6105> than the hairs <WH8185> of my head: <WH7218> therefore my heart <WH3820> fails <WH5800> me.
Be pleased, <WH7521> O LORD, <WH3068> to deliver <WH5337> me: O LORD, <WH3068> make haste <WH2363> to help <WH5833> me.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH2659> together <WH3162> that seek <WH1245> after my soul <WH5315> to destroy <WH5595> it; let them be driven <WH5472> backward <WH268> and put to shame <WH3637> that wish <WH2655> me evil. <WH7451>
Let them be desolate <WH8074> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say <WH559> to me, Aha, <WH253> aha. <WH253>

Let all <WH3605> those that seek <WH1245> you rejoice <WH7797> and be glad in you: let such as love <WH157> your salvation <WH8668> say <WH559> continually, <WH8548> The LORD <WH3068> be magnified. <WH1431>
But I am poor <WH6041> and needy; <WH34> yet the Lord <WH136> thinks <WH2803> on me: you are my help <WH5833> and my deliverer; <WH6403> make no <WH408> tarrying, <WH309> O my God. <WH430>
